column4: like, the icons in the top menu take like a quarter second to load from say... System
this is the small icons on the top menu...lol
this isant a lack of power issue here
I heard that using certain window managers make it run much faster
how would one setup a window manager, samulia?
apt-get it, kill the current one, run the new one.
I'm kind of a noob at this so, how exactly would I kill one, and what is the name of the package of a window manager
well, the window manager is up to you.  you'd open a console, `killall metacity && $window manager`
as long as you don't save the session, it shouldn't.
what do yu mean save the session?
when you log out, there should be a checkmark that says "save this session".  make sure it's unchecked
um, it saves what all programs are running, and runs them again next time you log in
because most users don't need to build software?
